TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StringPrototype extends Microsoft.JScript.StringObject

Docs.summary: Provides static methods and properties for objects. All methods of this class are called by passing in a reference to the object that is requesting access to the method. This class belongs to the built-in object model category.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string anchor (object thisob, object anchorName);
.method public static hidebysig string anchor(object thisob, object anchorName) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that this method is acting upon.
The name attribute of the anchor element.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified object to text enclosed in anchor tags, and gives the anchor element the specified name attribute.
Docs.returns: Converts the specified object to text enclosed in anchor tags, and gives the anchor element the specified name attribute.
